name: Captcha.eu
author: captchaeu

sections.description:
Captcha.eu is the ultimate solution for GDPR compliant captcha protection. Our plugin is designed to safeguard your website against spam and unwanted bot traffic while ensuring compliance with EU data protection regulations. With Captcha.eu, you can protect all your forms, including login and signup forms, with ease.

Our plugin provides out-of-the-box support for popular form plugins such as Ninja Forms, Contact Form 7, Elementor Pro, Gravity Forms, WooCommerce, Mailchimp for WordPress, and Divi. This means you can use Captcha.eu even if you have no technical expertise.

To start using our plugin, simply subscribe to our service on www.captcha.eu. If you need support or custom plans, you can contact us at hello@captcha.eu.

In today’s digital age, online security is a top priority for businesses and individuals alike. With the increasing prevalence of spam and unwanted bot traffic, it’s more important than ever to have a reliable and effective captcha solution. Captcha.eu offers just that, with its GDPR compliant plugin designed to provide maximum protection while ensuring compliance with EU data protection regulations.

Languages

  • German
  • English
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire captcha-eu folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen (Plugins > Installed Plugins).

You will find the Captcha menu in your WordPress admin screen.

For further information, have a look at the plugin’s website.
sections.faq:
Where do i find my REST and Public Key?

You can find your REST and Public Key in your Captcha Dashboard.

Which Forms/Plugins are currently protected by Captcha?

  • WordPress Login
  • WordPress Registration
  • WordPress Password Reset
  • WordPress Comments
  • Contact Form 7
  • Gravity Forms
  • Elementor Pro
  • Divi
  • Ninja Forms
  • WP Forms Lite
  • Mailchimp for WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.38

  • support elementor-pro popup forms

1.0.37

  • improve accessability of FragProtect

1.0.32

add FragProtect

1.0.31

  • allow skipping some gravitiyforms

1.0.30

  • fix WooCommerce issues with double calling authenticate/pw_reset

1.0.29

  • fix double sent emails on CF7

1.0.28

  • support marketpress / atomion woo commerce modal’s

1.0.27

  • allow short circiuit validation of gravitiy forms by using cpt_gform_skip_abort filter

1.0.26

  • add support for (patched) WordFence Login Security see documentation -> https://docs.captcha.eu/wordpress-install?id=-wordfence-login-security

1.0.25

  • update readme.txt – add video

1.0.24

  • fixed php 8.2 deprecated dynamic properties
  • minor fixes
  • removed obsolete code

1.0.23

  • added info/error nag

1.0.11

  • public release

1.0.0

  • Initial Version
